mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_postscript (site_postscript_rownum, username, site, category, comment, health, inoutside, cost, writetime, hitnum, likenum, route_code) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{site}, #{category}, #{comment}, #{health}, #{inoutside}, #{cost}, sysdate(), 0, 0, #{route_code})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM site_postscript WHERE site_postscript_rownum = (SELECT MAX(site_postscript_rownum) FROM site_postscript)

SELECT *, IF((sp.site_postscript_rownum in (SELECT site_postscript_rownum FROM site_postscript_like WHERE username = #{param1}) ) AND #{param1} IS NOT NULL,'true','false') as 'site_like' FROM site_postscript sp LEFT OUTER JOIN site_postscript_tag t ON sp.site_postscript_rownum = t.site_postscript_rownum
t.tag like '%' #{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
GROUP BY sp.site_postscript_rownum ORDER BY sp.site_postscript_rownum desc

SELECT * FROM (SELECT *, IF((site_postscript_rownum in (SELECT site_postscript_rownum FROM site_postscript_like WHERE username = #{param1}) ) AND #{param1} IS NOT NULL,'true','false') as 'site_like' FROM site_postscript) sp LEFT OUTER JOIN site_postscript_tag t ON sp.site_postscript_rownum = t.site_postscript_rownum WHERE sp.site_like = 'true' AND t.tag like '%' #{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' GROUP BY sp.site_postscript_rownum ORDER BY sp.site_postscript_rownum desc

SELECT * FROM site_postscript sp LEFT OUTER JOIN site_postscript_tag t ON sp.site_postscript_rownum = t.site_postscript_rownum WHERE sp.username = #{param1} AND t.tag like '%' #{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%' GROUP BY sp.site_postscript_rownum ORDER BY sp.site_postscript_rownum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_postscript_like (site_postscript_like_rownum, username, site_postscript_rownum) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{site_postscript_rownum})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM site_postscript_like WHERE username = #{username} AND site_postscript_rownum = #{site_postscript_rownum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO site_postscript_photo (site_postscript_photo_rownum, photo_src, site_postscript_rownum) VALUES (null, #{photo_src}, #{site_postscript_rownum})
